title: Politics of Migration
description: Examines the magnitude and the political, economic, cultural, environmental, and social impact of today's movement of millions of people within and amongst states.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to politics majors and Latin American and Latino studies/politics combined majors during first and second pass enrollment.

class_notes: Global Seminar, applications are now closed. To inquire about any late application deadlines, emailgloballearning@ucsc.edu.
